column4: Hi. Just installed Ubuntu 10.10 amd64. Also installed the proprietary Nvidia driver for my GTX 580. But for some reason Ubuntu looks like this: http://i.imgur.com/Qe15W.jpg and not like this: http://softfive.com/files/uploads/Ubuntu.jpg (which it does on other computers I've installed Ubuntu on)?
Well, yeah, some of it seems to use the ambience theme and other stuff looks "old"
Have you relogged Ubuntu since it was like this?
I used to have a similar issue when gnome-settings-daemon didn't start right
I rebooted after installing the nvidia driver, will try again
What shows up as your thme under appearance?
And see if it changes it
Have you tried alt+f2 and type "killall gnome-panel"?
Doesn't help :/ This is really weird
Is it anything other than the panel?
A agree, that is odd. Though that means that the problem is with GTK.
Hmm... Very weird indeed. Will try reinstalling, perhaps something fucked up. Thanks for trying though :).
